title: 1029 The 3 Steps to Finding Opportunity
description:
“An opportunity can be in a new person that you meet, it can be a problem to solve, or the solution to something you’ve been struggling with for a long time.”

It can be really hard to find and identify the opportunities that surround us everyday, especially when our lives are filled with stressful situations and overwhelming events. But hopefully with these three steps you'll find yourself taking on the world in a new way!

For more go to: www.lewishowes.com/1029
